Kasaloo Kyanga (May 20, 1957 September 9, 2011) bụ onye egwu Congo, onye na-akpọ ụbọ akwara, na onye na-ede egwu

Ihe egwu Kyanga, gụnyere egwu egwu "Masafa Marefu", nke ya na Tancut Almasi Orchestra dere, na-aga n'ihu na-abụ ndị egwu. Egwú ndị ọzọ ọ na-agụnye "Nimemkaribisha Nyoka", "Butinini", "Kashasha", na "Kambwembwe".
A mụrụ ya na ejima ya, Kyanga Songa, na Mee 20, 1957.
Kyanga na Songa so ndị otu Tangut rụọ ọrụ
Ndị bịara hụ ụdị Fimbo Lugoda na Kinyekinye Kisonzo Tisa Kumi Mangala
Kyanga, onye a maara maka olu ya, si na Democratic Republic of Congo (Zaire n'oge ahụ) bịa Tanzania na 1980. Kyanga malitere ịrụ ọrụ na Orchestra Matimila Band, nke Remmy Ongala duziri
Ụfọdụ n'ime ọrụ ya a ma ama gụnyere, "Almasi", "Bishada", "Natoa Onyo", na "Usia"
Kyanga sokwa onye egwu Congo Skassy Kasambula rụkọọ ọrụ.
Kyanga, Kasambula, na Semhando gara Tomatoma, Kyanga dekwara "Mwanaidi"

O mechara sonyere nwanne ya nwoke Songa dị ka onye na-agụ egwú na Orchestra Marquis Original Kyanga na Songa ghọrọ ndị a ma ama na egwu dịka "Karubandika", "Sofia", "Clara", "Hasira Hasara", "Ni Wewe Pekee", na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ nwetara otuto n'ụwa niile. Kyanga na Songa mechara hapụ Orchestra Marquis wee soro Tancut Almasi Orchestra rụọ ọrụ na Iringa. Egwú ndị ọzọ gụnyere, "Masafa Marefu", "Pili Wangu", "Tutasele", "Kiwele", na "Jane Butinini" (nwunye Kyanga), mere ka ha bụrụ ndị a ma ama.
HụButinini, onye bụbu kpakpando netball, bụ nwanne nwanyị Duncan Butini, onye bụzi onye otu egwuregwu bọọlụ Railways si Morogoro.
HA mara ọkwa ọnwụ Kyanga n'isi ụtụtụ nke Septemba 9, 2011
Ọ nwụrụ site na nsị pleural. Onye egwu ochie Kikumbi Mwanza Mpango Mwema, nke a maara nke ọma dị ka Eze Kiki, kwupụtara ọnwụ Kyanga.
